entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
